languages.text: {n}Идира поднимает на вас отрешенный взгляд, сдобрив его искусственной улыбкой. От нее пахнет дешевым амасеком и стимуляторами.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Скоро все закончится, не так ли? Наконец-то, все закончится..." {n}Псайкер делает долгую паузу.{/n} "Прошу прощения, я не спала уже несколько дней — голоса никак не оставят меня в покое. Я соберусь и не подведу вас. Обещаю".

{n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира поднимает на вас отрешенный взгляд, сдобрив его искусственной улыбкой. От нее пахнет дешевым амасеком и стимуляторами.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Скоро все закончится, не так ли? Наконец-то, все закончится..." {n}Псайкер делает долгую паузу.{/n} "Прошу прощения, я не спала уже несколько дней — голоса никак не оставят меня в покое. Я соберусь и не подведу вас. Обещаю".

It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept for several days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉抬头看着你，脸上带着冷漠的表情，随后露出了假意的笑容。她身上带着廉价艾玛赛克酒与兴奋剂的味道。{/n}“舰长大人，这一切很快就会结束了，是吧？终于要结束了……”{n}她沉默了很久。{/n}“抱歉，我已经好几天没睡过觉了，那些声音总是缠着我。我会克服的，我不会让你失望，我保证。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉抬头看着你，脸上带着冷漠的表情，随后露出了假意的笑容。她身上带着廉价艾玛赛克酒与兴奋剂的味道。{/n}“舰长大人，这一切很快就会结束了，是吧？终于要结束了……”{n}她沉默了很久。{/n}“抱歉，我已经好几天没睡过觉了，那些声音总是缠着我。我会克服的，我不会让你失望，我保证。”

languages.text: {n}Idira blickt mit abwesender Miene zu dir auf und setzt dazu noch ein falsches Lächeln auf. Sie riecht nach billigem Amasec und Stimulanzien.{/n} "Lord Captain. Bald ist alles vorbei, nicht wahr? Endlich vorbei ..." {n}Sie verstummt lange.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, ich habe seit Tagen nicht geschlafen. Die Stimmen lassen mir einfach keinen Frieden. Ich komme schon darüber hinweg. Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen. Versprochen."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

Bald ist alles vorbei, nicht wahr? Endlich vorbei ..." {n}Sie verstummt lange.{/n} "Es tut mir leid, ich habe seit Tagen nicht geschlafen. Die Stimmen lassen mir einfach keinen Frieden. Ich komme schon darüber hinweg. Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen. Versprochen."

languages.text: {n}Idira lève vers vous un regard embué, accompagné d'un sourire quelque peu forcé. Elle empeste l'amasec bon marché et les stimulants.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Tout sera bientôt fini, hein ? Enfin fini... » {n}Elle s'enferme un long moment dans le silence.{/n} « Désolée, ça fait des jours que je n'ai pas dormi à cause des voix qui me harcèlent. Mais ça va aller. Vous pouvez compter sur moi, je vous le promets. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lève vers vous un regard embué, accompagné d'un sourire quelque peu forcé. Elle empeste l'amasec bon marché et les stimulants.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Tout sera bientôt fini, hein ? Enfin fini... » {n}Elle s'enferme un long moment dans le silence.{/n} « Désolée, ça fait des jours que je n'ai pas dormi à cause des voix qui me harcèlent. Mais ça va aller. Vous pouvez compter sur moi, je vous le promets. »

languages.text: {n}Idira te mira con rostro distante y una sonrisa falsa. Huele a amasec barato y estimulantes.{/n} «Lord Capitán, falta poco, ¿verdad? Pronto acabará todo...». {n}Guarda un largo silencio.{/n} «Lo siento, llevo varios días sin dormir. Las voces no paran. Lo superaré. No le decepcionaré, lo prometo».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

Pronto acabará todo...». {n}Guarda un largo silencio.{/n} «Lo siento, llevo varios días sin dormir. Las voces no paran. Lo superaré. No le decepcionaré, lo prometo».

languages.text: {n}イディラは無表情であなたを見上げ、作り笑いを浮かべている。彼女から安物のアマセックと興奮剤の臭いがする。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。もうすぐ終わるのよね？やっと…」{n}彼女は長い時間黙り込んだ。{/n}「ごめんなさい、もう何日も寝ていないの…声がうるさくて。でも大丈夫。あなたをガッカリさせるようなことはしないわ。約束する」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは無表情であなたを見上げ、作り笑いを浮かべている。彼女から安物のアマセックと興奮剤の臭いがする。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。もうすぐ終わるのよね？やっと…」{n}彼女は長い時間黙り込んだ。{/n}「ごめんなさい、もう何日も寝ていないの…声がうるさくて。でも大丈夫。あなたをガッカリさせるようなことはしないわ。約束する」

languages.text: {n}İdira, gerçeklikle bağı kesilmiş bakışlarla sana bakıyor ve bunu sahte bir gülümsemeyle taçlandırıyor. Ucuz amasek ve uyarıcı kokuyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. Yakında her şey sona erecek, değil mi? Nihayet..." {n}Uzunca bir süreliğine sesiz kalıyor.{/n} "Üzgünüm, günlerdir uyumadım. Sesler beni rahat bırakmıyor. Aşacağım bunu. Seni yüzüstü bırakmayacağım. Söz veriyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira looks up at you with a disconnected expression and couples it with a fake smile. She smells of cheap amasec and stimulants.{/n} "Lord Captain. It'll all be over soon, won't it? Finally over..." {n}She falls silent for a long time.{/n} "I'm sorry, I haven't slept in days — the voices just won't leave me alone. I'll get over it. I won't let you down. I promise."
